title: His to Taste
description: Her first taste of passion left her craving for seconds...What do you do when you're an unemployed virgin, devouring online erotica to block out your strict grandmother's nagging? You hire yourself out as a live-in cook for a gorgeous author, naturally.Recent college grad Lynn Strickland is tired of the constant rejection due to her lack of experience in the office and the bedroom. With mounting bills to pay and her grandmother's savings dwindling, she answers an employment ad and discovers that her new boss isn't exactly a geriatric little sweetie.After fantasizing about Jake Cochran, will she settle with keeping him as a character in her naughty stories, or is she ready to offer him a taste?
author: Jacqueline Winlock
